summary: A collection of compatibility patches for Solemn Keep Chronicles and other mods.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#d8d8d8][size=3][i]These are a collection of compatibility patches for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83291?]Solemn Keep Chronicles[/url] and other mods.
[/i][/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=#d8d8d8][size=3][i]There are currently patches for:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69610/]Moonshimmer Mine[/url][/i][/size][/color][/center]
[size=3][i][font=Georgia][color=#a2c4c9]Installation[/color][/font][/i][/size]
[list]
[*][size=2]Download the patch that you need and place it in Data folder[/size]
[*][size=2]Load Patch after SolemnKeep.esp and YourOtherMod.esp[/size]
[*][size=2]Enjoy![/size]
[/list]
[size=2]If you need a compatibility patch (mainly for fixing edits to the worldspace), let me know in the comments and I [i]might[/i] create one if I have the time. Thanks! [/size]
author: Savaas
